document_data.name: Attraction
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Attraction''''' was a [[divine]] [[alteration]] [[spell]] that was granted to [[specialty priest]]s of [[Bhaal]], up until the [[Time of Troubles]]. It removed any negative feelings the target had towards the caster and replaced them with favorable emotions. The reverse of this spell, '''''[[disdain]]''''', reversed feelings in the opposite manner.

This spell was commonly used by [[Church of Bhaal|Bhaalists]] to counteract the air of death that constantly surrounded them.
document_data.Components: [[Verbal component|Verbal]], [[somatic component|somatic]] and [[material component]]s were required in the casting of this spell. The material component was the ''[[holy symbol]]'' of the caster.
